resources.string:
Hi, my name is Kelechi. 

I love God. 

He forgives me per seconds even when i intentionally sin 

My sins are great but His Love is Greater 

Even thou I walked through the shadow of death i fear no evil 

He fixed me daily even when forget to pray 

He guides all my Love ones 

I am proud to say I am a child of God 

So called me Child of God if u forget my Name 

It's fine by me 

Singed....Opara Kelechi 

Peace!!!
